models.Tool: A web development capability that agents can invoke for development tasks.
models.ToolParameter: A parameter that a development tool accepts.
models.ToolPackage: An npm package that provides development tools.
models.EnvironmentVariable: Workspace configuration for APIs and services.
models.UsageReference: Where a tool is used in the prompt library.

relationships: EnvironmentVariable is used by one or more Tools

tools.name: Component Generator
tools.description: Generates React components with TypeScript, proper typing, and boilerplate code.

parameters.name: componentName
parameters.description: Name of the component to generate

parameters.name: props
parameters.description: Array of prop definitions with types

parameters.name: cssFramework
parameters.description: CSS framework to use (tailwind, css-modules, styled-components)

tools.documentation: Generates production-ready React components with TypeScript interfaces, proper prop typing, accessibility attributes, and optional test files. Supports Tailwind CSS, CSS Modules, and styled-components.

tools.name: Hook Generator
tools.description: Creates custom React hooks with TypeScript typing and proper patterns.

parameters.name: hookName
parameters.description: Name of the hook (must start with 'use')

tools.documentation: Generates custom React hooks following best practices. Includes proper TypeScript typing, effect cleanup, dependency array handling, and optional test files using @testing-library/react-hooks.

tools.name: API Client Generator
tools.description: Generates typed API clients from OpenAPI/Swagger specifications.

parameters.name: clientType
parameters.description: Type of client: fetch, axios, or ky

tools.documentation: Generates fully typed API clients from OpenAPI specifications. Creates TypeScript interfaces for all request/response types, endpoint functions with proper typing, error handling, and optional React hooks for data fetching.

tools.name: TypeScript Type Generator
tools.description: Infers and generates TypeScript types from JSON schemas and API responses.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: JSON schema or example JSON object

parameters.name: typeName
parameters.description: Name for the generated interface or type

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Options for type generation (strict, optional props, etc.)

tools.documentation: Generates TypeScript interfaces and types from JSON schemas or example JSON objects. Handles nested objects, arrays, unions, and optional properties. Useful for quickly typing API responses.

tools.name: Test Generator
tools.description: Generates unit tests using Testing Library and Vitest/Jest.

parameters.name: componentPath
parameters.description: Path to the component file to test

tools.documentation: Generates comprehensive unit tests for React components using Testing Library. Includes tests for rendering, user interactions, accessibility attributes, edge cases, and error states.

tools.name: Bundle Analyzer
tools.description: Analyzes bundle size and provides optimization recommendations.

parameters.name: buildPath
parameters.description: Path to the build output directory

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: Size threshold for warnings in KB

tools.documentation: Analyzes webpack/vite bundle output to identify large modules, duplicate code, and optimization opportunities. Provides actionable recommendations for reducing bundle size.

tools.name: Accessibility Linter
tools.description: Checks components for accessibility issues and WCAG compliance.

parameters.name: wcagLevel
parameters.description: WCAG compliance level: A, AA, or AAA

tools.documentation: Analyzes React components for accessibility issues including missing ARIA labels, keyboard navigation problems, color contrast issues, and semantic HTML violations. Provides WCAG compliance reports.

tools.name: Performance Profiler
tools.description: Profiles component render performance and identifies optimization opportunities.
tools.documentation: Profiles React component render performance using React DevTools Profiler API. Identifies unnecessary re-renders, expensive computations, and memoization opportunities.

tools.name: ESLint Config Generator
tools.description: Generates ESLint configuration based on project tech stack.
tools.documentation: Generates optimized ESLint configuration based on the project's tech stack. Includes framework-specific rules, TypeScript support, and recommended settings for the chosen strictness level.

tools.name: Storybook Generator

parameters.name: variantTypes
parameters.description: Types of story variants to generate

tools.documentation: Generates Storybook stories for React components including common variants (states, sizes, themes), interactive controls, and documentation. Supports CSF format and autodocs.

packages.name: @devtools/components
packages.description: Component generation tools for React and TypeScript.
packages.author: DevTools

packages.name: @devtools/api
packages.description: API client generation from OpenAPI specifications.
packages.author: DevTools

packages.name: @devtools/types
packages.description: TypeScript type inference and generation tools.
packages.author: DevTools

packages.name: @devtools/testing
packages.description: Test generation utilities for Testing Library.
packages.author: DevTools

packages.name: @devtools/a11y
packages.description: Accessibility linting and WCAG compliance checking.
packages.author: DevTools
